TEXT.TITLE: CONTINENTAL GENERAL INSURANCE <CGIC> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 20 cts vs 21 cts Net 783,564 vs 806,278 Year Shr 89 cts vs 86 cts Net 3,443,392 vs 3,242,588 Note:Full company name is Continental General Insurance Co Net includes profit from sale of securities of 155,410 dlrs, or four cts a share, and 192,896 dlrs, or five cts a share, respectively, in 1986 qtr and year, and of 12,879 dlrs, or nil per share, in 1985 qtr. Net for 1985 year includes loss from sale of securities of 315,763 dlrs, or eight cts a share. Reuter
